item.title:
RT by @dogdaypress: ‚ú® @AngelOlsen: it's been a lot ‚ú®
The songwriter's new album was forged during a period in which she fell in love, came out and lost her parents in quick succession. In her hometown, she gets into the details of the aptly-titled Big Time
‚Üí https://buff.ly/3LD6aB8
item.dc:creator: @LoudAndQuietMag

item.title:
RT by @dogdaypress: Ahead of her debut solo album 'Giant Palm', @naimabock spoke to Dan Webster for Wax to discuss how her upbringing and departure from Goat Girl led her to create a gorgeously intimate record.

item.title: RT by @dogdaypress: 'Through The Fires‚Äô is a song I wrote to remind myself that this life is temporary, that it‚Äôs important to keep moving, keep searching for the people that are also searching, and to notice the moments that are bigger than whatever trouble I‚Äôve encountered. https://bit.ly/39WtlZN
